Latest blog post

6 November, 2017

TTFN R/GA

The time has come to close a precious chapter of my career. Six years ago I joined R/GA and by crikey, it has been quite a ride. I’ll soon be handing in my R/GA badge and gun to move on to my next adventure, and I’m incredibly excited about it. But more on that later. For now, I want to take a breath and reflect on six rewarding years.

Recent links

  • Dev.to

    https://dev.to/

    An interesting looking and lively technical discussion site

  • Airtable

    https://airtable.com/

    Airtable works like a spreadsheet but gives you the power of a database to organize anything. Sign up for free.

  • Gatsby

    https://www.gatsbyjs.org/

    A static site generator which uses React and provides both pre-rendering and client-side hydration. Some interesting bonuses included such as easy service worker support and GraphQL built in for provising templates with their data.
